item.description: Authorities have warned the category two tropical cyclone could get even stronger.

item.title: Family of sick Perth toddler Aurelia Patel in race against clock for treatment
item.description: ‘I’m just a dad trying to save my little girl.’

item.title: Australia explain Usman Khawaja’s absence after Marnus Labuschagne forced to open Ashes innings
item.description: ‘That momentum was lost the moment they couldn’t find him when it came time to bat.’

item.title: Ageing Australian Test stars shredded by own fans after nightmare Ashes opener in Perth
item.description: ‘He really fooled the whole world.’

item.title: Woman, 57, dies after car veers off road into bushland in remote western NSW
item.description: Paramedics assessed the woman, but she was pronounced dead at the scene.

item.title: Oscar Piastri sparks F1 storm by sharing old post about McLaren preferring Lando Norris
item.description: Tensions between the Aussie star and his team have seemingly exploded at the Las Vegas Grand Prix.

item.title: Elderly woman killed and another critical after two-car crash on Sydney’s North Shore
item.description: A passenger in the victim’s car remains in a critical condition.

item.title: Tropical Cyclone Fina strengthens to Category 3 as it heads towards Darwin
item.description: Residents are facing destructive wind gusts up to 224km/h.

item.title: Watch Unfiltered: Alex Carey lays bare emotional toll of explosive 2023 Ashes on Seven and 7plus Sport
item.description: ‘The kids were over there too.’

item.title: Outrageous price of Aussie meat pie at Vegas Grand Prix has fans in state of shock
item.description: ‘That is absolutely criminal.’

item.title: Two men face court, young woman hospitalised after dramatic road chase in Wagga Wagga
item.description: Two people were allegedly knocked from a motorbike in the chaotic incident.

item.title: Ashes recap: Travis Head smashes stunning century to lead Aussies to victory in first Test
item.description: Recap all the action from a dramatic second and final day of the first Test.

item.title: Olivia Dean slams Ticketmaster, Live Nation and AEG for ‘disgusting’ concert ticket prices
item.description: ‘You are providing a disgusting service.’

item.title: Pedestrian killed in early-morning crash at Brooklyn intersection in Melbourne’s west
item.description: The driver involved is assisting police with their enquiries.

item.title: Triple-code sports jet Sarah Rowe and former AFL star Scott Selwood hard launch relationship
item.description: ‘NASA doesn’t even launch this hard!’

item.title: The Ashes: CA boss has no issue with Usman Khawaja playing golf a day before first Test
item.description: The veteran opener was widely criticised for the move.

item.title: Teenager and man charged after allegedly spraying Bossley Park home with bullets in filmed drive-by shooting
item.description: Shocking video surfaced online after more than 20 bullets were fired into the house.

item.title: Driver killed as trailer detaches and hits car on Newell Highway in western NSW
item.description: The 33-year-old man died at the scene.

item.title: North Melbourne into AFLW grand final after defeating Melbourne in ‘game of the year’
item.description: The premiership favourites survived an almighty scare to extend their historic winning streak.

item.title: Brisbane widow’s $6 million prize home win comes with unexpected luxury
item.description: The life-changing prize has brought Lucy more than she bargained for.

item.title: No luck for Oscar Piastri in wet and wild Vegas qualifying as Lando Norris takes pole
item.description: ‘There were a few things that didn’t go great.’

item.title: St Kilda recruit Tom De Koning restricted to individual program after suffering a calf injury
item.description: The new Saint will be on a restricted program when his senior teammates return to training.

item.title: Six people killed in crashes across Australia’s east
item.description: Four men and two women died in separate incidents in NSW and Victoria.

item.title: Australian motorsport legend Allan Moffat dies after long health battle
item.description: ‘He was a pioneer, a champion and an icon whose impact on our sport is impossible to measure.’

item.title: 7NEWS The Issue Podcast: How $100k homes assembled like Lego could solve Australia’s housing crisis
item.description: ‘The industry is going to be a completely different place in three to five years.’

item.title: Queensland teenager given 5 per cent chance of survival at birth celebrates high school graduation
item.description: When Jessica Simmonds was born at 25 weeks, she weighed just 382g.

item.title: Lions storm into AFLW grand final with big win over Blues
item.description: The victory sets up a third-straight premiership decider against North Melbourne.

item.title: Adelaide teenager calls out gaming giants as bullied players demand change
item.description: Cody doesn’t want to see any more players spiral into despair.

item.title: Sad end looms for Usman Khawaja as Australia urged to accept Ashes ‘gift’ after Travis Head century
item.description: The veteran has been exposed by his own teammate and there’s nowhere left to hide.

item.title: Northern Territory residents wake to major clean-up operation after tropical cyclone Fina
item.description: Hospitals and schools have been damaged as the system passed close to Darwin.

item.title: Stuart Broad reaction goes viral as legends shame ‘stupid England’ after first Test collapse against Australia
item.description: A meme was born and the recriminations began, with a ‘has-been’ biting back hard.

item.title: Machete gang terrorises three Melbourne families in 20-minute crime spree
item.description: One family fought back with a young man grabbing a knife to take on the offenders.

item.title: One dead, two teenagers and two adults rushed to hospital in life-threatening conditions after shocking Lawnton house fire
item.description: Neighbours were evacuated as fire crews battled to contain the blaze.

item.title: Tennis legend Boris Becker celebrates arrival of his fifth child on his 58th birthday
item.description: The former world No.1 is just three years removed from a stint in a notorious prison.

item.title: Wallabies’ disastrous 48-33 loss to France secures unwanted piece of history
item.description: The Aussies’ unprecedented defeat has heaped more pressure on the coach to fall on his sword.
